summary: TRANSMISSION SHIFTING ISSUES ON 1ST GEAR AND WHEN DOWNSHIFTING THIS IS A KNOWN PROBLEM EVEN IN THE DEALERSHIP THE MECHANICS SAID THIS IS A RECALL IN PROGRESS BUT NO WEBSITE NOT EVEN MOPAR SHOWS THIS RECALL; IT IS A KNOWN ISSUE AND CHRYSLER IS EVADING IT.  I HAVE TAKEN MY CAR THERE TWICE AND THEY DO NOTHING AND TELL ME TO WAIT FOR THE RECALL LETTER; IT IS UNACCEPTABLE.  THE CAR WILL OVER REV AND SHIFT ABRUPTLY TAKING OFF OR DOWNSHIFTING I FEEL LIKE I WILL HIT ANOTHER CAR ONE OF THIS DAYS OR HAVE AN ACCIDENT. SEE ATTACHED FILES I HAVE CONTACTED MOPAR AND THE DEALERSHIP TWICE WITH NO RESULTS.
